definition: to confine/to lock up/to pen in

sentences.english: On a rainy day, Mayor Bloomberg opened the show with these words.

sentences.english: In that day the Lord will snatch away their finery: the bangles and headbands and crescent necklaces
sentences.chinese: 到那日，主必除掉她们华美的脚钏，发网，月牙圈。

sentences.english: Also, stitch the edge of the window screen which is between the lower circle and the flank of the cone.
